title: First Sound Finder
description: Listen to a word and identify the first sound from multiple picture choices. An interactive phonemic awareness game for kindergarten students.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Reading
Phonemic Awareness
Early Literacy
learningObjectives: Identify the first sound in spoken words
Match pictures based on shared beginning sounds
Build foundational skills for phonics instruction
prerequisites: Familiarity with common objects and animals

controls.label: Hear Word
controls.description: Speaks the target word aloud using text-to-speech

controls.label: Next Word
controls.description: Generates a new question with a different target word

controls.label: Picture Choices
controls.description: Four picture options, click to select your answer

variables: currentWord - The target word students must match
